meanings.definition: Of or relating to an uncle.
meanings.sent1: He showed an avuncular smile when he saw his nephew.
meanings.sent2: The avuncular advice he gave was filled with warmth and care.
meanings.sent3: The avuncular pat on the back made the child giggle.
meanings.sent4: His avuncular presence was like a comforting blanket on a cold day.
meanings.sent5: The memory of his avuncular nature lingered long after he left.

meanings.definition: Characteristic of an uncle, especially in being kind or indulgent.
meanings.sent1: Her avuncular gestures made everyone feel at ease.
meanings.sent2: The avuncular tone in his voice was soothing and reassuring.
meanings.sent3: The avuncular teasing at the family gathering brought laughter to all.
meanings.sent4: His avuncular demeanor was like a gentle breeze on a hot summer day.
meanings.sent5: The warmth of his avuncular presence enveloped the room.

meanings.definition: Acting like an uncle, especially in being protective or supportive.
meanings.sent1: She took on an avuncular role, guiding her younger siblings with care.
meanings.sent2: His avuncular nature shone through as he offered a helping hand.
meanings.sent3: The avuncular scolding he gave was met with grateful smiles.
meanings.sent4: In times of need, his avuncular presence was a pillar of strength.
meanings.sent5: The memory of his avuncular protection stayed with them through the years.
